meanings.definition: Divided into three lobes or segments.
meanings.sent1: The trilobate leaf had three distinct sections.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar had a trilobate body with three clear parts.
meanings.sent3: The trilobate cookie was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her trilobate necklace symbolized the past, present, and future.
meanings.sent5: The trilobate mountain stood majestically in the distance.

meanings.sent1: The trilobate flower had petals in three separate sections.
meanings.sent2: The trilobate rock formation was a unique sight.
meanings.sent3: The trilobate puzzle was challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: His trilobate artwork represented harmony in diversity.
meanings.sent5: The trilobate starfish crawled along the ocean floor.
